trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Broomfield
There were no other sightings in Broomfield on or around November 2nd 2013
Summary: 3 dim lights in triangle shape no sound flying SE in the sky. Thin see through clouding
divs: sighting detailsme and my wife were sitting in the hot tub in the backyard looking up at the stars just talking. thought at first for a split second that it was a shooting star and as we both realized what we were seeing,it was 3 lights in a perfect triangle shape there was no sound at all the object was flying south\east...omg is what we both thought as we watched this object flying in the sky and we could not believe what we were seeing. we lost sight of the object behind the neighbors trees.
